entry.p: This module manages the output profiles for export as well as the rendering intent to be used when mapping between the different color spaces.

darktable comes with pre-defined profiles sRGB, AdobeRGB, XYZ and linear RGB but you can provide additional profiles by placing these in $DARKTABLE/share/darktable/color/outand $HOME/.config/darktable/color/out. $DARKTABLEis used here to represent your chosen darktable installation directory and $HOMEyour home directory.
